pages.text: Plant fiber comes from breaking long grass or tumbleweeds. You'll need it to make your starter tools.$(br2)Look for rivers! They may be choked with quicksand, but their banks can hold grass and clay.
Wood and stone tools aren't available; use flint.$(br2)Metal tools need to be forged on a Tinker's Anvil or cast in a Metal Caster.

Oases typically have one or two large ore deposits, instead of many small ones. The ore flowers on the surface will show you where to dig.$(br2)Platinum deposits aren't marked by flowers the way other ores are; you'll need to use a prospecting pick to look for nuggets, instead.
The desert has barely any ores except for coal, saltpeter, and oil.$(br2)Oil wells often have larger deposits somewhere below them.$(br2)Crouch while chopping a tree to fell the entire tree at once.
You can find silkworms in birch leaves. Use the silk they shed to craft light, cooling armour.$(br2)Feed silkworms leaf blocks to make them produce silk faster.
